tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a critical Command Injection vulnerability in the `gif_outputAsJpeg` function via the `$lpszFileName` parameter. An attacker can exploit this by injecting system commands into the filename parameter, which are then executed by the server, leading to arbitrary remote code execution and full compromise of the affected system. It is strongly advised to immediately update to the latest version and thoroughly review server logs for any signs of malicious activity.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `james-heinrich/phpthumb` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
